question: If there was no mahr set on Nika, and husband has never paid any Mahar to his wife. Is this Nikah is valid?
answer:
QUESTION
Imam of Turkish Mosque did Nikah. How can it be fix now after seven year of marriage.
ANSWER


Share:
The Nikah will be valid. The Mahr will be a debt on the husband and her. He can pay the Mahr now.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
FATWA DEPT.
